caption.center: LAZARUS CALHOUN, JR., Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Alachua County. Martha Ann Lott, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Nancy A. Daniels, Public Defender, and M. J. Lord, Assistant Public Defender, Tallahassee, for Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, and Christine A. Guard, Assistant Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BARFIELD, ALLEN, and THOMAS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
